channel.title: The Dalles-California Highway on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in The Dalles-California Highway on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-97 South Approaching OR-138
item.description: US-97 south approaching OR-138 (North Umpqua Highway) to Diamond Lake, Roseburg, and Medford.

item.title: US-97 South at OR-58
item.description: US-97 South at OR-58 in Klamath County. Use OR-58 west to Eugene and Oakridge (via Willamette Pass). Continue south on US-97 for Klamath Falls and California.

item.title: Powers Road West at US-97 North (Bend Parkway)
item.description: Powers Road West at US-97 North (Bend Parkway) to Redmond.

item.title: Powers Road East Approaching US-97 North
item.description: Powers Road East approaching US-97 North

item.title: SE Scott Ave. West at US-97 South
item.description: SE Scott Ave. West at US-97 South (Bend Parkway) to Klamath Falls. SE Scott Ave. becomes NW Colorado Ave. westbound. Use NW Colorado Ave. to Mt. Bachelor (Ski Area).

item.title: SE Scott St. West at US-97
item.description: SE Scott St. West at US-97 (Bend Parkway) onramp (Exit 138). Use US-97 north for Redmond; US-97 south for Klamath Falls.

item.title: US-97 South at OR-293
item.description: US-97 south at OR-293. Use OR-293 east to Antelope, John Day Fossil Beds, and Fossil.

item.title: US-97 South Approaching OR-293
item.description: US-97 south approaching OR-293 in Jefferson County.

item.title: US-97 South - Jefferson County
item.description: Entering Jefferson County on US-97 South.

item.title: US-97 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-97 south. Distance to Madras, Redmond, and Bend.

item.title: US-97 North at US-197 - Wasco County
item.description: US-97 North at US-197 in Wasco County. Use US-197 north for Maupin and The Dalles; US-97 North for Wasco and Biggs.

item.title: End US-197 South Approaching US-97
item.description: End US-197 South approaching US-97. Use US-97 south for Madras and Bend; US-97 north for Biggs and Wasco.

item.title: US-197 South Approaching US-197
item.description: US-197 South approaching US-197. Use US-97 north for Wasco and Biggs; US-97 south for Madras and Bend.

item.title: US-197 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-197 south. Distance to Madras and Bend.

item.title: US-197 South - Deschutes River Recreation Area
item.description: US-197 South at Deschutes River Recreation Area/City Park (Bakeoven Road) junction.

item.title: US-197 South - Maupin
item.description: Entering Maupin on US-197 South.

item.title: US-197 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-197 south. Distance to Maupin and Bend.

item.title: US-197 North at OR-216 West
item.description: US-197 North at OR-216 West to Government Camp and Portland. OR-216 East joins US-197 North to Tygh Valley.

item.title: OR-216 East at US-197
item.description: OR-216 East at US-197 in Wasco County. Turn right for US-197 South to Maupin and Bend. OR-216 East joins US-197 north to Tygh Valley. Turn left for US-197 North/OR-216 East to Tygh Valley and The Dalles.

item.title: US-197 South/OR-216 West at US-197/OR-216 Split
item.description: US-197 South/OR-216 West at US-197/OR-216 Split. Turn right for OR-216 West to Government Camp and Portland.

item.title: US-197 South/OR-216 West at US-197/OR-216 Split
item.description: US-197 South/OR-216 West at US-197/OR-216 Split in Wasco County.

item.title: US-197 South/OR-216 West Approaching US-197/OR-216 Split
item.description: US-197 South/OR-216 West approaching US-197/OR-216 Split. Turn right for OR-216 West to Government Camp and Portland.

item.title: US-197 South at OR-216 East
item.description: US-197 South at OR-216 East to Sherars Bridge and Grass Valley. Turn right for Tygh Valley and Wamic. OR-216 west joins US-197 southbound.

item.title: OR-216 West at US-197
item.description: OR-216 West at US-197 in Wasco County. Use US-197 north for The Dalles; turn left for US-197 South/OR-216 West for Bend and Maupin; continue straight for Tygh Valley and Wamic. OR-216 west joins US-197 southbound.

item.title: US-197 South - Tygh Ridge Summit
item.description: US-197 South at Tygh Ridge Summit - Elevation 2665 Ft.

item.title: US-197 South at Dufur Jct.
item.description: US-197 South at Dufur Jct. Continue south on US-197 for Maupin and Bend.

item.title: US-197 South - Dufur Jct.
item.description: US-197 South - north entrance to Dufur Jct.

item.title: US-197 South - Eight Mile Creek
item.description: Eight Mile Creek on US-197 South.

item.title: US-197 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-197 south. Distance to Dufur and Bend.

item.title: US-197 South - The Dalles
item.description: US-197 south in The Dalles.

item.title: US-197 South/US-30 West at Split
item.description: US-197 South/US-30 West at US-197/US-30 split. Turn right for US-30 west to The Dalles. Turn left for US-197 south to Dufur and Bend.

item.title: US-197 South/US-30 West at I-84 East
item.description: US-197 South/US-30 West at I-84/US-30 East to Arlington. Continue on US-197 South/US-30 West for Dufur and Bend.

item.title: US-197 South at I-84
item.description: US-197 south at I-84 West. Use I-84 west to Portland. Continue over freeway for I-84 east to Arlington. Continue south on US-197 for Bend.

item.title: US-197 North at I-84 East
item.description: US-197 North at I-84 East to The Dalles and Portland. Continue north on US-197 for Yakima (Washington).

item.title: US-197 North/US-30 East at I-84 East
item.description: US-197 North/US-30 East at I-84 East to Arlington. Continue north on US-197 for The Dalles Dam Visitor Facilities and Yakima (Washington). US-30 east joins I-84 eastbound to Pendleton.

item.title: US-197 North/US-30 East Approaching I-84
item.description: US-197 North/US-30 East approaching I-84 in The Dalles.

item.title: US-97 North/US-26 West at US-26/US-97 Split
item.description: US-97 North/US-26 West at US-26/US-97 Split. Turn right to continue north on US-97.

item.title: US-97 North/US-26 West Approaching US-97/US-26 Split
item.description: US-97 North/US-26 West Approaching US-97/US-26 split in Madras. Turn right for US-97 North to Biggs and The Dalles. Continue straight for US-26 West to Mount Hood and Portland.

item.title: US-26 West at US-97 - Jefferson County
item.description: US-26 West at US-97 in Jefferson County. Turn left for US-97 south to Redmond and Bend; turn right for US-97 North/US-26 West to Madras. US-26 West joins US-97 North through Madras.

item.title: Oregon St. West at US-97 South
item.description: Oregon St. West at US-97 South to Weed (California). Continue west for Lake of the Woods and Medford (both via Lakeshore Drive and OR-140).

item.title: US-97 South Approaching OR-31
item.description: US-97 south approaching OR-31. Use OR-31 south for Reno (Nevada).

item.title: US-97 South Approaching OR-31
item.description: US-97 south approaching OR-31. Use OR-31 south for Silver Lake and Lakeview.

item.title: US-97 South - Exit 153
item.description: US-97 south at Exit 153 - Century Drive/Sunriver. This is the southern end of the divided highway which begins north of Redmond.

item.title: US-97 South - Exit 151
item.description: US-97 south at Exit 151 - Cottonwood Road.

item.title: US-97 South - Exit 143
item.description: US-97 south at Exit 143 - Baker Road/Knott Road.

item.title: US-97 South at Bus. US-97 Jct.
item.description: US-97 South at Bus. US-97/Third St. junction. This is the southern end of the Bend, Oregon business loop, and also the southern end of the Bend Parkway section of US-97.

item.title: US-97 South at Powers Road Eastbound
item.description: US-97 south at Powers Road Eastbound junction.

item.title: US-97 South - Exit 139
item.description: US-97 south at Exit 139 - Reed Market Road/Old Mill District.

item.title: US-97 South at Truman Avenue
item.description: US-97 south at Truman Ave. intersection.

item.title: US-97 South - Exit 138
item.description: US-97 south at Exit 138 - Downtown/Mt. Bachelor.

item.title: US-97 South - Hawthorne Ave.
item.description: US-97 south at Hawthorne Ave. junction.

item.title: US-97 South - Lafayette Ave
item.description: US-97 south at Lafayette Ave. intersection.

item.title: US-97 South - Exit 137
item.description: US-97 south at Exit 137 - Revere Ave./Downtown.

item.title: US-97 South Approaching Exit 136
item.description: US-97 south approaching Exit 136 - Butler Market Road.

item.title: US-97 South - Exit 135A
item.description: US-97 south at Exit 135A - Business US-97/US-20/Business District/Burns.

item.title: US-97 South Approaching Exit 135A
item.description: US-97 south approaching Exit 135A - US-20/Business District/Burns/Business US-97.

item.title: US-97 South at Tumalo Road Jct.
item.description: US-97 South at Tumalo Road/Deschutes Market Road junction.

item.title: US-97 South At 61st St. Jct.
item.description: US-97 South At 61st St./Gift Road junction.

item.title: US-97 South at Yew Ave. IC
item.description: US-97 south at Yew Ave interchange.

item.title: US-97 South - Overhead
item.description: US-97 south to Bend and Klamath Falls overhead.

item.title: US-97 South at OR-126 West
item.description: US-97 south at OR-126 west to Sisters and Salem. US-97 continues south towards Bend and Klamath Falls.

item.title: US-97 South Approaching OR-126 East
item.description: US-97 South approaching OR-126 East (Evergreen Ave.) Use OR-126 east for Prineville and John Day.

item.title: US-97 South at Antler Ave
item.description: US-97 south at Antler Ave junction.

item.title: US-97 South - Exit 119
item.description: US-97 south at Exit 119 - US-97 Business/N. Redmond/N. Canal Blvd. This is the north end of the Redmond bypass. US-97 formerly followed the route of Business US-97 through downtown Redmond. The new bypass runs to the east of the old highway.

item.title: US-97 South at OR-370 (O'Neil Highway)
item.description: US-97 south at OR-370 to O’Neill and Lone Pine. OR-370 is not signed as such at this junction, but is part of the O’Neil Highway. This is part of the Oregon State Highway system that did not have a posted route number. In recent years the Oregon Department of Transportation has been assigning numbers to routes that have previously been unsigned.

item.title: US-97 South
item.description: US-97 South shield, taken just south of the US-97/US-26 split south of Madras.

item.title: US-97 South/US-26 East at Split
item.description: US-97 South/US-26 East at US-97/US-26 split. Turn left for US-26 east to Prineville, Mitchell, and John Day.

item.title: US-97 South/US-26 East at Split
item.description: US-97 South/US-26 East at US-97/US-26 Split. Turn left to continue on US-26.

item.title: US-97 South at US-26
item.description: US-97 south at US-26. Turn right for US-26 west to Portland. Turn left for US-26 east and US-97 south to Redmond, Prineville, and Bend. US-26 joins US-97 south through Madras.

item.title: US-97 South Approaching US-26
item.description: US-97 south approaching US-26 in Madras.

item.title: US-97 South at US-197
item.description: US-97 south at US-197. Use US-97 south for Madras and Bend. The northbound destination sign for US-197 was knocked over and lying on the ground.

item.title: US-97 South at US-197
item.description: US-97 south at US-197 junction. Taken at Shaniko Junction.

item.title: US-197 South/US-30 West at Split
item.description: US-197 South/US-30 West at US-197/US-30 split. Turn right for US-30 west to The Dalles. Turn left for US-197 south to Dufur and Bend.

item.title: US-197 South - Welcome To Oregon
item.description: Welcome to Oregon on US-197 south in The Dalles. The Oregon welcome sign is about half a mile from the actual state line on the bridge over the Columbia River.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 87
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 87 - US-197/Dufur/Bend. US-30 joins I-84 east to Pendleton.

item.title: OR-140 East at US-97 North
item.description: OR-140 east at US-97 north. Use US-97 north of Klamath Falls and Bend. Continue east on OR-140 for Lakeview, and OR-39 to Merill. OR-140 meets OR-39 on the east side of Klamath Falls.

item.title: US-97 South at OR-66/OR-140
item.description: US-97 south at OR-66/OR-140 junction. Use OR-66/OR-140 west for Keno, Ashland, and Medford. Use OR-140 east for Lakeview. This is the eastern end of OR-66.

item.title: US-97 South - Exit 277
item.description: US-97 south approaching Exit 277 - OR-66/OR-140/Lakeview/Medford.

item.title: US-97 South at Oregon Ave./Lakeshore Drive
item.description: US-97 south offramp at Oregon Ave./Lakeshore Drive. Use Oregon Ave. for City Center (Klamath Falls). Use Lakeshore Drive for Lake of the Woods

item.title: US-97 South at Oregon Ave./Lakeshore Drive Exit
item.description: US-97 south at Oregon Ave./Lakeshore Drive exit. Oregon Ave. heads east into downtown Klamath Falls. Lakeshore Drive follows the west shore of Klamath Lake before joining up with OR-140.

item.title: US-97 South at OR-39/Bus. US-97
item.description: US-97 south at OR-39/Bus.US-97 south to Klamath Falls and Reno (Nevada). US-97 continues south towards Weed and San Francisco (California).

item.title: US-97 South Approaching Bus. US-97/OR-39
item.description: US-97 south approaching Bus. US-97/OR-39. Continue south on US-97 for Weed and San Francisco.

item.title: US-97 South at OR-62
item.description: US-97 south at OR-62 to Fort Klamath and Crater Lake.

item.title: US-97 South Approaching OR-62
item.description: US-97 south approaching OR-62 junction.

item.title: US-97 South - Exit 247
item.description: US-97 south at Exit 247 - OR-422/Chiloquin/Crater Lake.

item.title: US-97 South - Exit 247
item.description: US-97 south approaching Exit 247 - Fort Klamath/Sprague River.

item.title: US-97 South - Exit 247
item.description: US-97 south approaching Exit 247 - OR-422/Chiloquin/Crater Lake.

item.title: Silver Lake Road at US-97
item.description: Silver Lake Road at US-97. Use US-97 south for Klamath Falls. Use US-97 north for Chemult.

item.title: US-97 North - Silver Lake Road
item.description: US-97 north at Silver Lake Road. Use Silver Lake Road for Klamath Marsh National Wildlife Refuge HQ and Silver Lake.

item.title: US-97 South - Worden
item.description: Entering the community of Worden on US-97 south.

item.title: US-97 South Overhead
item.description: Distance marker on US-97 south for Weed, and OR-66/OR-140 junction. Leaving the city of Klamath Falls.

item.title: US-97 South - Klamath Falls City Center Exit
item.description: US-97 south approaching the Klamath Falls City Center exit.

item.title: US-20 East/US-97 Business at US-97 South
item.description: US-20 West/Business US-97 South at Division St./Downtown exit. Approaching US-97 South/Mt. Bachelor/Klamath Falls exit.

item.title: US-97 South - Exit 135A
item.description: US-97 south at Exit 135A - US-20/US-97 Business/Business District/Burns.

item.title: US-97 North - Exit 135A
item.description: US-97 north at Exit 135A - US-20 West/Sisters/Salem.

item.title: US-97 North Approaching Exit 135A - US-20
item.description: US-97 north approaching Exit 135A. Use left lanes for US-97 North/Redmond/Portland.

item.title: US-97 North - Exit 135B
item.description: US-97 north at Exit 135B - Empire Blvd./State Offices

item.title: US-97 North - Exit 137
item.description: US-97 north at Exit 137 - Revere Ave./Downtown.

item.title: US-97 North - Exit 138
item.description: US-97 north at Exit 138 - Downtown/Mt. Bachelor

item.title: Reed Market Road at US-97 Exit 139
item.description: Reed Market Road west at US-97 junction. Use US-97 north for Redmond. Use US-97 south for Klamath Falls.

item.title: US-97 South at OR-138
item.description: US-97 south at OR-138 (North Umpqua Highway) west to Diamond Lake, Medford, and Roseburg.

item.title: US-97 South Approaching OR-138
item.description: US-97 south approaching OR-138 (North Umpqua Highway) to Diamond Lake, Roseburg, and Medford.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 87
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 87 - US-30/US-197/Dufur/Bend

item.title: US-197 South Approaching I-84
item.description: US-197 south to Bend at I-84 west to Portland, and approaching I-84 east to Arlington.

item.title: US-197 South Approaching I-84/US-30
item.description: US-197 south approaching I-84/US-30. This junction is immediately after the Columbia River bridge.

item.title: US-97 North approaching OR-58
item.description: US-97 north approaching OR-58 to Oakridge and Eugene.

item.title: US-97 North at BL-97/To US-20 East
item.description: US-97 north approaching Bus. US-97/To US-20/Third St./Burns, 1/4 mile.

item.title: US-97 North at BL-97/To US-20 East
item.description: US-97 north at Bus. US-97/To US-20 East/Third St./Burns.

item.title: US-97 North at OR-138 West
item.description: US-97 north at OR-138/N. Umpqua Highway to Roseburg and Medford.

item.title: US-97 North at OR-31/Silver Lake/Lakeview
item.description: US-97 north approaching OR-31 south to Lakeview and Silver Lake.

item.title: US-97 North at OR-58/Eugene
item.description: US-97 North to Bend/OR-58 to Eugene split.

item.title: US-97 North Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker to La Pine and Bend on US-97 north.

item.title: US-97 North of OR-138
item.description: US-97 north shield at OR-138 junction.

item.title: OR-126 East at US-97
item.description: OR-126 East approaching US-97 in Redmond. At the time this photo was taken, US-97 ran through downtown Redmond on two parallel one-way streets. Recently, US-97 passes through Redmond on a bypass.

item.title: OR-126 East at US-97 North
item.description: OR-126 East at US-97 North to Madras and Portland. Use OR-126 east for Prineville and John Day.

item.title: US-97 South at OR-126 West
item.description: US-97 South at OR-126 West in Redmond. Continue south on US-97 to Bend and Klamath Falls. Use OR-126 west for Sisters, Eugene, and Salem. US-97 has been rerouted through Redmond on a bypass since this photo was taken.
